report.title: Works for Me
report.author: St. John
report.bodytext: For me st. john's wort is comparable to 20 mg prozac twice a day. I take it as recommended by the manufacturer and have tremendous results. I was on prozac for a few years for depression, then I stopped taking it because I thought I did not need it. Then I met my wife who introduced me to the wort and it makes me feel as if I am on prozac and it's completely all natural.
